articles.title: Lionel Messi's MLS debut postponed amid Miami Leagues Cup run - ESPN
articles.description: Lionel Messi will have to wait a few days longer to make his official debut in Major League Soccer with Inter Miami.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi will have to wait a few days longer to make his official debut in Major League Soccer.

articles.author: Martin Rogers
articles.title: Why the spread of women's soccer makes 2027 World Cup bid fascinating
articles.description: This 2023 tournament is showcasing how women's soccer isn't just deeper but also geographically wider. This spread is good for the game, but also creates a fascinating conundrum over where the next World Cup should be staged.
articles.content: The World Cup is the most popular tournament in women's soccer, but it is also a showcase, an unrivaled opportunity for some of the brightest stars in the game to be seen, heard and for the full weig… [+4993 chars]

articles.title: Video: Why some Americans are cheering the US women's soccer team's loss | CNN Politics
articles.description: CNN’s Laura Coates discusses why some conservatives are celebrating the US women’s soccer team’s recent World Cup loss with Rachel Nichols, host of “Headliners with Rachel Nichols.”

articles.author: Doug McIntyre
articles.title: 10 potential coach candidates if USWNT moves on from Vlatko Andonovski
articles.description: No announcement regarding coach Vlatko Andonovksi's future has been made, but here are 10 possible replacements if U.S. Soccer decides to go another direction after this disappointing World Cup finish.
articles.content:
